postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
yum install -y wget
 wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/flynet/flynet_mobius_start.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh
 sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW all
 git clone https://github.com/kthare10/flynetDemo.git /root/flynetDemo
 cd /root/flynetDemo/
 git checkout -b edge-fix
 git pull origin edge-fix
 cd core; sh core.sh STARTIP WORKERS > /var/log/core.log 2>&1
